thread.title: Fonterra may cut hundreds of jobs
thread.title_full: Fonterra may cut hundreds of jobs

title: Fonterra may cut hundreds of jobs
text:
Fonterra may cut hundreds of jobs 
  2:37 p.m. 
(Getty) 
Fonterra has started consulting with staff as it looks to cut hundreds of jobs in a major restructure. 
The company announced last month that it was reviewing business on the back of a slump in dairy prices. 
Today, more than 100 staff in Hamilton are reportedly meeting with management. 
A spokesperson says it's part of the business review that's being carried out globally. 
RadioLIVE
